properties.name: Kangaroo Point Cliffs Lookout
properties.location:
Scout Place
300 River Terrace, Kangaroo Point QLD 6571
Australia
properties.description: Kangaroo Point Cliffs Lookout is a prominent heritage-listed site in Brisbane, Australia, offering panoramic views of the Brisbane River and city skyline. The cliffs were formed from volcanic rock quarried in the 19th century, contributing to the construction of early Brisbane buildings. Today, the area is a popular recreational spot, featuring picnic areas, walking and cycling paths, and opportunities for rock climbing and abseiling. The lookout provides a unique vantage point to observe the cityscape, especially at sunrise and sunset. Accessible via footpaths from South Bank Parklands, the Story Bridge, and the Kangaroo Point Green Bridge, the site is also reachable by ferry to Holman Street or Maritime Museum terminals. The cliffs are illuminated at night, enhancing the scenic experience.

properties.name: Kangaroo Point Cliffs Park
properties.location:
46 River Terrace
Kangaroo Point QLD 8936
Australia
properties.description: Kangaroo Point Cliffs Park is a scenic destination located along the Brisbane River, offering breathtaking views of the city skyline and the riverbanks. This park is famous for its dramatic cliffs, which rise steeply from the river, providing an excellent spot for rock climbing and abseiling. Visitors can enjoy walking and cycling paths, picnic areas, and expansive grassy fields perfect for leisure activities. The park also features iconic lookout points, making it an ideal place for photography and enjoying sunsets. It's a popular location for both locals and tourists seeking outdoor adventures in a picturesque setting.

properties.name: Brisbane Rock Climbing - 3 Hours Night
properties.location:
46 River Terrace
Kangaroo Point QLD 8936
Australia
properties.description: Kangaroo Point cliff face is a unique sight in the heart of Brisbane, climb the cliffs whilst they are lit up in the evening. The urban cliff offers a unique rock climbing experience, allowing beginners and the experienced to be challenged by its various routes. After learning the basic safety procedures you will be able to familiarize yourself with the vertical world in this 3 hour evening activity.

properties.name: Joey's
properties.location:
46 River Terrace
Kangaroo Point QLD 8936
Australia
properties.description: Joey's is a vibrant, all-day dining destination offering stunning panoramic views of Brisbane. Known for its relaxed atmosphere and warm hospitality, it serves Italian-inspired dishes including wood-fired pizzas, fresh pasta, and local seafood. Breakfast highlights include Joey's Big Brekkie, loaded croissants, and nourishing bowls. For lunch and dinner, favourites include spatchcock, Mooloolaba prawns, lamb ribs, and artisan pizzas. Guests can also enjoy fresh juices, premium coffee, and classic spritz cocktails. With a mix of hearty meals, seasonal produce, and unbeatable views, Joey's is a go-to spot for casual yet memorable dining with loved ones.

properties.name: Riverlife Adventure Centre
properties.location:
Naval Stores Kangaroo Point Cliffs Drive
Kangaroo Point QLD 8936
Australia
properties.description: Riverlife Adventure Centre is nestled along the stunning Kangaroo Point Cliffs in Brisbane, Australia. This outdoor adventure hub provides exhilarating activities like kayaking on the Brisbane River, rock climbing the cliffs, and biking along scenic paths. With a picturesque location, visitors can enjoy the panoramic views of the city skyline and lush surroundings while engaging in various adventurous pursuits. The centre emphasizes both fun and safety, making it a popular spot for individuals, families, and corporate groups looking to explore the great outdoors.

properties.name: St Mary's Anglican Church
properties.location:
877 Main St
Kangaroo Point QLD 8936
Australia
properties.description: St Mary's Anglican Church, situated on Main Street in Kangaroo Point, boasts a Gothic architectural style. Constructed in 1873 by Alfred Grant and designed by Richard Suter, it stands as a historic and religious landmark. The church provides a peaceful setting with views of the Brisbane skyline and features stained glass, an apse, and an old organ. Christmas Mass includes a Cantor and choir.

properties.name: Lamberts Restaurant
properties.location:
49 Lambert St
Kangaroo Point QLD 8936
Australia
properties.description: Lamberts Restaurant, located within The Point Brisbane Hotel, offers a sophisticated dining experience in Kangaroo Point. Under the guidance of Head Chef Marcus Turner, the restaurant emphasizes a paddock-to-plate philosophy, sourcing fresh, locally produced ingredients to craft innovative dishes. The open, light-filled dining area overlooks the hotel's pool and gardens, providing a pleasant ambiance. The menu features a variety of modern Australian fare, including options like Asian-spiced sticky beef brisket, South Australian sashimi-grade yellowtail kingfish, and Mooloolaba-caught swordfish. The fully air-conditioned cocktail bar and lounge area is also a popular gathering place for those drawn by its quiet sophistication and contemporary wine, beer, and cocktail list. Lamberts serves buffet breakfast and a la carte lunch and dinner seven days a week.

properties.name: Institute of Modern Art (IMA)
properties.location:
Ground Floor Judith Wright Centre of Contemporary Arts
620 Brunswick St, Fortitude Valley QLD 6007
Australia
properties.description: The Institute of Modern Art (IMA) is Australia's oldest independent contemporary art space, established in 1975. Located on the ground floor of the Judith Wright Arts Centre in Fortitude Valley, Brisbane, the IMA presents an annual program of exhibitions, public programs, publications, and offsite programs by Queensland, Australian, and international artists. The gallery features temporary exhibitions that change approximately every six weeks, showcasing a diverse range of contemporary artworks. In addition to visual art exhibitions, the IMA hosts lectures, artist talks, and workshops, and publishes artist monographs, history and theory texts. The IMA Gallery Shop offers a selection of art books, local design, and unique gifts. Admission to the IMA is free, and the gallery is open Tuesday to Sunday from 10:00 AM to 5:00 PM.

properties.name: Brooki Bakehouse
properties.location:
35 Marshall St
Fortitude Valley QLD 6007
Australia
properties.description: Brooki Bakehouse is located on Marshall Street in Fortitude Valley, Australia. The bakery is known for its creative cookies, including New York-style cookies. Other items include cupcakes with flavors such as carrot and salted caramel. While some reviewers praise the chunky cookies, moist carrot cake cupcakes, and friendly service, others have noted inconsistencies in texture and flavor. It has become quite popular on social media.

properties.name: Betty's Burgers
properties.location:
Tenancy 5, Howard Smith Wharves
5 Boundary St, Brisbane City QLD 6000
Australia
properties.description: Betty's Burgers is renowned for its classic American-style burgers, offering a nostalgic dining experience reminiscent of 1950s diners. The restaurant is known for its fresh, high-quality ingredients and a menu that features a variety of burgers, including beef, chicken, and vegetarian options. In addition to burgers, Betty's Burgers also serves sides such as fries and onion rings, as well as a selection of milkshakes and desserts. The interior decor often reflects a retro theme, enhancing the overall dining experience.

properties.name: Felons Brewing Co
properties.location:
5 Boundary St
Brisbane City QLD 6000
Australia
properties.description: Felons Brewing Co is a contemporary brewery situated under the Story Bridge on the banks of the Brisbane River. The venue features a spacious indoor area with a working brewery, a riverside beer garden, and a fish and chipper offering fresh seafood. The menu includes wood-fired pizzas, burgers, and elevated pub classics, emphasizing seasonal and locally sourced produce. The brewery offers a range of beers, including core and specialty brews, and hosts weekly events such as live music, trivia, and yoga sessions. Brewery tours are available on weekends, providing insights into the brewing process.

properties.name: Riverwalk Lookout
properties.location:
82A Boundary St
Brisbane City QLD 6000
Australia
properties.description: This location provides sweeping views of the Brisbane River and the iconic Story Bridge. It serves as a peaceful retreat from the bustling riverside walk, perfect for capturing photos or taking a brief rest. The area is known for its scenic boardwalk, which is ideal for a leisurely hike, run, or simply enjoying the surroundings. While the boardwalk can become crowded during peak morning and evening hours, the nearby Central Business District offers a variety of dining and drinking options, including some upscale restaurants. This lookout site is a notable landmark in Brisbane City, offering both natural beauty and urban convenience.

properties.name: Centenary Park
properties.location:
85 Wickham St
Fortitude Valley QLD 6007
Australia
properties.description: Centenary Park, located in Fortitude Valley, is a charming urban park featuring lush greenery and well-maintained pathways. It is an ideal spot for both locals and visitors seeking a tranquil escape from the city bustle. The park includes picnic areas, playgrounds, and open spaces for various outdoor activities. It often serves as a venue for community events and gatherings, making it a vibrant part of the local culture. With its scenic environment, Centenary Park is perfect for leisurely strolls and outdoor relaxation.

properties.name: Cathedral Square
properties.location:
Cathedral Square
Brisbane City QLD 8000
Australia
properties.description: Cathedral Square in Brisbane City is a notable public space situated near St. John's Cathedral. It serves as a vibrant meeting point for locals and visitors alike, often hosting various events and community gatherings. The square features lush landscaping, seating areas, and pathways that invite relaxation and social interaction. The cathedral, with its stunning architecture, adds to the scenic backdrop, making it a popular spot for photography and leisurely strolls. Additionally, the square is close to cafes and shops, enhancing its appeal as a destination in the heart of the city.

properties.name: Riverland Brisbane
properties.location:
932 Eagle St
Brisbane City QLD 8000
Australia
properties.description: Riverland Brisbane is a vibrant three-level waterfront bar and eatery situated along the Brisbane River, offering panoramic views of the Story Bridge. The venue features an expansive 800-square-metre deck extension, accommodating up to 1,000 patrons. Its design includes a central island bar and five individual kitchens housed in shipping containers, creating a dynamic food-truck atmosphere. The Queenslander kitchen serves modern pub fare with a local twist, while The Traveller offers a rotating menu of global street foods, with its first destination being Mexico. The extensive beverage menu includes unique cocktails, an array of Australian and international wines, and 16 tap beers and ciders. Live acoustic music and DJs provide entertainment from Wednesday to Sunday, enhancing the lively atmosphere.

properties.name: Le Bon Choix
properties.location:
126 Queen St
Brisbane City QLD 8000
Australia
properties.description: Le Bon Choix is a renowned bakery situated in Brisbane's central business district. Established in 2004, it specializes in French-inspired pastries, cakes, and bread, crafted with meticulous attention to detail. The bakery's offerings include almond croissants, macarons, tarts, and sourdough bread, all made using traditional techniques. The charming European-style courtyard provides a pleasant setting for patrons to enjoy their selections alongside coffee or tea. Le Bon Choix has expanded its presence with multiple locations across Australia, maintaining a reputation for quality and authenticity in its baked goods.

properties.name: Brooklyn Standard
properties.location:
Eagle Ln
Brisbane City QLD 8000
Australia
properties.description: Brooklyn Standard is a New York-themed basement bar situated in Brisbane's CBD, accessible via a secret laneway door on Eagle Lane. The venue hosts live music acts six nights a week, featuring genres such as funk, soul, rockabilly, and R&B. Decorated with U.S. memorabilia, the bar offers an extensive drinks list, including American beers and classic cocktails. While there is no kitchen, patrons can enjoy free bowls of salted pretzels with their drinks. The venue has been recognized as Australia's Best Live Music Venue in 2015, 2019, and 2021 at the Australian Bar Awards.

properties.name: Saint Stephen's Cathedral
properties.location:
361 Elizabeth St
Brisbane City QLD 6000
Australia
properties.description: Saint Stephen's Cathedral is a striking example of Gothic Revival architecture located in Brisbane City. The cathedral, with its stunning stained glass windows and intricate design, serves as the mother church of the Roman Catholic Archdiocese of Brisbane. It was consecrated in 1991, reflecting over a century of history and tradition. The site features beautifully landscaped gardens and a peaceful courtyard, inviting visitors to explore its spiritual and cultural heritage. The interior showcases a blend of contemporary and traditional elements, making it a significant attraction for both worshippers and tourists.

properties.name: Madame Wu
properties.location:
Upper Plaza Level
29 Eagle St, Brisbane City QLD 8000
Australia
properties.description: Madame Wu is a contemporary dining establishment that offers a modern take on Asian cuisine. Situated on the Upper Plaza Level of 71 Eagle Street in Brisbane, the restaurant provides stunning views of the Brisbane River and Story Bridge. Known for its innovative menu, Madame Wu combines traditional Asian flavors with modern culinary techniques, offering dishes that are both visually appealing and delicious. The restaurant features a stylish and sophisticated interior, creating an inviting atmosphere for diners. Madame Wu also boasts an extensive wine and cocktail list, complementing its diverse menu.

properties.name: Corbett & Claude
properties.location:
451 Elizabeth St
Brisbane City QLD 8000
Australia
properties.description: Corbett & Claude is a restaurant known for its inviting atmosphere and communal dining experience. Located in Brisbane City, it offers a menu that features a variety of pizzas, pastas, and share plates, making it a popular spot for groups and gatherings. The restaurant is named after the historic Corbett Chambers building, adding a touch of heritage to its modern dining concept. Guests can enjoy a selection of craft beers, wines, and cocktails, complementing the diverse food offerings.

properties.name: Escape Manor
properties.location:
82/79 Edward St
Brisbane City QLD 8000
Australia
properties.description: Escape Manor in Brisbane City offers an engaging experience through a variety of themed escape rooms designed for groups seeking adventure and teamwork. Each room presents unique puzzles and challenges, immersing participants in different storylines. The venue's atmospheric design adds to the sense of excitement, making it a popular choice for entertainment among locals and visitors alike. Ideal for friends, family, or team-building events, Escape Manor fosters collaboration and problem-solving as players race against time to solve mysteries and escape before the clock runs out.

properties.name: Mr Edward's Alehouse & Kitchen
properties.location:
67 Edward St
Brisbane City QLD 6000
Australia
properties.description: Mr Edward's Alehouse & Kitchen is a European-inspired gastropub situated at the corner of Edward and Margaret Streets in Brisbane's CBD. The venue features a spacious interior with polished wood floors, black leather chairs, and ambient lighting, creating a warm and inviting atmosphere. The outdoor terrace offers a relaxed setting to enjoy craft beers and meals. The menu includes European crowd-pleasers such as pizzas, pastas, and mains like spanner crab linguini, chicken parmigiana, striploin steak, and seared salmon. The beverage selection boasts a variety of local ales, craft beers, and an extensive wine cellar.

properties.name: Moo Moo The Wine Bar and Grill
properties.location:
Port Office Building
16 Edward St, Brisbane City QLD 8000
Australia
properties.description: Moo Moo The Wine Bar and Grill is a premier dining destination located in the Port Office Building of Brisbane City. Renowned for its expertly prepared steaks sourced from high-quality local and international producers, the restaurant offers a diverse menu that also includes fresh seafood and delectable sides. Guests can enjoy an extensive wine list featuring both local Australian and international selections, perfect for enhancing any meal. The stylish yet inviting atmosphere makes it ideal for casual dining, special occasions, or business meals, ensuring a memorable experience for all visitors.

properties.name: City Botanic Gardens
properties.location:
Brisbane City QLD 8000
Australia
properties.description: City Botanic Gardens is a picturesque park located in the heart of Brisbane, Australia. Established in 1855, it covers 56 acres of lush greenery, with walking paths, ponds, and diverse plant collections. Visitors can explore the beautiful heritage-listed landscapes, including significant trees and well-curated flower beds. The gardens serve as a tranquil escape from the bustling city, offering spaces for picnics, events, and leisurely strolls. Various monuments and art installations also enhance the natural beauty, making it a popular destination for both locals and tourists.

properties.name: The Brisbane Synagogue
properties.location:
14 Margaret St
Brisbane City QLD 6000
Australia
properties.description: The Brisbane Synagogue, established in 1882, is the oldest synagogue in Queensland and acts as a focal point for the Jewish community. Located on Margaret Street, its stunning architecture features a blend of Gothic and Romanesque styles, highlighted by beautifully crafted stained glass windows. As a place of worship, it hosts regular services and community events, providing a rich cultural atmosphere. Visitors are welcome to explore its historical significance and learn about Jewish traditions and practices in Brisbane.

properties.name: Ciao Papi
properties.location:
5 Boundary St
Brisbane City QLD 6000
Australia
properties.description: Ciao Papi is an Italian restaurant situated at the New Farm end of the Howard Smith Wharves precinct in Brisbane City. The restaurant offers a riverside dining experience with views of the Brisbane River. It serves classic Italian dishes crafted with handmade pasta, chargrilled meats, fresh seafood, and seasonal produce. The menu includes antipasti, pasta, pizza, and desserts, complemented by an extensive selection of premium wines. Ciao Papi also provides event spaces for functions and private gatherings, accommodating groups of various sizes. The venue features both indoor and outdoor seating options, including the Glass House and Nonna's Table, each offering unique settings for different occasions.

properties.name: New Farm Riverwalk
properties.location:
New Farm Riverwalk
Brisbane QLD
Australia
properties.description: New Farm Riverwalk is a picturesque pathway that stretches along the Brisbane River, offering tranquil views and a relaxing environment for pedestrians and cyclists alike. This popular destination features well-maintained gardens and seating areas, making it ideal for leisurely strolls or picnics. The Riverwalk connects various parks and attractions, providing easy access to nearby cafes and cultural sites in the vibrant New Farm area. With its scenic appeal and recreational opportunities, it serves as a favorite spot for both locals and tourists seeking to experience the beauty of Brisbane.

properties.name: Wilson Outlook Reserve
properties.location:
243 Bowen Tce
New Farm QLD 6007
Australia
properties.description: Wilson Outlook Reserve is a picturesque park situated in New Farm, Australia, offering stunning views of the Brisbane River and the surrounding metropolitan area. It features lush greenery and well-maintained pathways, making it an ideal spot for picnics, leisurely walks, or simply relaxing outdoors. The reserve is popular for its expansive open spaces and beautiful gardens, providing a serene escape from the urban environment. Visitors can enjoy the tranquil atmosphere while taking in the scenic vistas, making it a lovely destination for both locals and tourists.

properties.name: Double Shot
properties.location:
2/325 Oxlade Dr
New Farm QLD 6005
Australia
properties.description: Double Shot New Farm is a cozy cafe nestled along the Brisbane River in New Farm. Known for its freshly baked pastries and wholesome meals, the cafe offers a variety of breakfast and lunch options. Signature dishes include soft-scrambled eggs encased in flaky pastry with smoked salmon and tomato chutney, as well as rustic sauteed button mushrooms with sweet chilli and coriander, topped with poached eggs and served on sourdough. For lunch, patrons can enjoy smoked trout pate on toasted pane with marinated mushrooms and rocket, or a refreshing goat's cheese and beetroot salad. The cafe also serves a selection of freshly baked goods, including passionfruit cheesecake, bread and butter pudding, and Banoffee tart. With a laid-back atmosphere and outdoor seating, Double Shot New Farm is a popular spot for both locals and visitors seeking a delightful dining experience.

properties.name: New Farm Park
properties.location:
2086 Brunswick St
New Farm QLD 8004
Australia
properties.description: New Farm Park is a spacious public park in the heart of New Farm, renowned for its lush greenery, beautiful gardens, and scenic river views. It spans over 34 hectares and includes a variety of recreational facilities, including walking and biking paths, picnic areas, and playgrounds. The park is particularly famous for its vibrant community and hosts various events throughout the year, showcasing local arts and culture. Visitors can enjoy the picturesque surroundings while engaging in outdoor activities, making it a popular destination for both locals and tourists.

properties.name: Beccofino
properties.location:
Cnr of, 20 Vernon Terrace
Florence St, Teneriffe QLD 8004
Australia
properties.description: Beccofino is a renowned Italian restaurant situated at the corner of Vernon Terrace and Florence Street in Teneriffe, Queensland. The establishment is celebrated for its authentic Italian cuisine, featuring wood-fired pizzas, fresh pasta dishes, and a selection of traditional desserts. The ambiance is enhanced by fairy lights and warm service, creating an inviting atmosphere for diners. Signature dishes include the Tartufo pizza, infused with truffle flavors, and the creamy chicken involtini. The wine list is thoughtfully curated to complement the meals, and desserts like tiramisu and almond torta are highly praised. Beccofino operates from Tuesday to Sunday, with specific hours varying by day.
